pkgmetadata.longdescription: Beta Product Confidence Procedure for Right Censored Data // Calculates nonparametric pointwise confidence intervals for the survival distribution for right censored data, and for medians [Fay and Brittain doi:10.1002/sim.6905]. Has two-sample tests for dissimilarity (e.g., difference, ratio or odds ratio) in survival at a fixed time, and differences in medians [Fay, Proschan, and Brittain doi:10.1111/biom.12231]. Especially important for latter parts of the survival curve, small sample sizes or heavily censored data. Includes mid-p options.
